title: BRICKELL: SENSATIONAL HIGH-RISE APARTMENT WITH BREATHTAKING VIEWS
posting_body: ['Enjoy a remarkable experience at this centrally located 1800 sq.', 'ft. apartment with panoramic views stretching from the water to the entire city.', "Whether you're looking for a comfortable feel for you and your family, or a stylish getaway for you and your partner, we can assure you will always feel at home.", "Located in the heart of Brickell, our guests can enjoy the luxury of a short walk to the shopping center, Miami's best restaurants and breathing pathways along the water.", 'Den has a pullout couch.', '2 bedrooms, 2 1/2 bathrooms, AC, dedicated workspace, washer/dryer, hot tub, kitchen, carbon monoxide alarm, pool, TV, Wifi, exercise equip., first aid kit, smoke alarm, paid parking on premises', '$7000 a month plus security deposit', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'for more information (Shared room option for $3500.)']
